name: Volant Technologies
overview:
Volant provides consulting services in silicon sensors, MEMS, and nanotechnology. They also serve the emerging areas of semiconductor-based photovoltaics, micro-fuel cells, and energy harvesting.

Volant Specializes in: 

* Business Development.
* Product & Technology Strategy.
* Expert Witness Deposition & Testimony.
* Product Execution and Project Management.
* Foundry prototyping & outsourcing.
* Cost reduction, performance improvement & miniaturization.

Serving the follwoing industries: 

* Medical devices and disposables.
* Fiber optics and optical networking.
* MEMS-based optical displays and projection.
* Passenger automobiles and commercial trucking.
* Wireless environmental monitoring and tagging.
